attributes.action: create a forum utilising the skills and Knowledge in Industry to ensure we stop wasting resources in puplic services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britan has some of the world finest business people , not just captains of industry and CEO , but people running factories and businesses which provide services and products in a very competetive environment. They focus on waste and effeciency on short and long term basis , using the priciples of Continuos improvement. Could we not apply this to areas of Government spending ???
